General.Description: Binance coin (BNB) is a digital currency developed on the blockchain platform of Ethereum under the ERC20 standard. BNB coin was released by Binance, China's largest digital currency trading platform, with the goal of maintaining and developing Binance's system. BNB coin is used to trade with other coins on Binance along with BTC, ETH, and USDT.
General.Features: The features of BNB coin are extremely powerful. First, Safety and Stability: Binance uses a multi-level and multi-cluster system architecture. Second, multi-device support: Binance supports web browsers, Android, HTML5, WeChat and other platforms. Third, High Performance: Binance can handle 1.4 million orders per second. Multilingual support: Binance supports Chinese, English, Japanese and Korean. Next, support multiple coins: Binance accepts transactions with a variety of coins, including BTC, ETH, LTC, and BNB. Finally, Proven Products: The Binance Platform has been deployed on over 30 interfaces already available. This platform supports all devices and languages, providing a seamless user experience.
General.Technology: The Binance's Blockchain technology is capable of handling 1.4 million orders per second that makes it a world leader in potential exchange volume.
